title: Djeison Rafael: Man charged with attempted murder after woman stabbed in the neck in centre of Birmingham
description: Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood says she is shocked by the "unprovoked attack" - and has urged anyone with information to come forward.
content:
A man has been charged with attempted murder after a woman was stabbed in the neck in Birmingham city centre.

title: Will a new mutated flu strain cause a rough winter?
description: Leading flu experts say they will not be surprised if this year's is the worst flu season for a decade.
content:

title: 'Top Gear' Host Was 68
description: Quentin Willson, the British TV host known for Top Gear and Britain's Worst Driver, has died after a brief illness with lung cancer. He was 68.
content:
Quentin Willson, the British TV host known for Top Gear and Britain’s Worst Driver, has died. He was 68.
In a statement from his family shared with multiple outlets, they announced that he died “peacefully surrounded by his family” during a brief ill... [1750 chars]

title: Pat McFadden: The silent welfare disease is crippling a generation
description: The work and pensions secretary says rising youth unemployment and illness has led to a ‘crisis of opportunity’ that’s harming Britain
content:
“We cannot afford to lose a generation of young people to a life on benefits, with no work prospects and not enough hope.
